allow:

Add comprehensive documentation and JSDoc comments

- Add detailed README.md with API reference, usage examples, and configuration guide
- Add module-level JSDoc with @module and @description for all source files
- Add JSDoc comments with @param, @returns, @throws, @example for all public exports
- Include code examples for API client, store, and utility functions

EOF
